module.name: part_template_extension
module.keywords: module, electrical, pattern, template, electronic, shape property, acid trap, material addition features

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information necessary to describe the different types of templates. These templates provide the shape and other property information for the feature to be used in the design of the interconnect substrate.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Fabrication technology, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1670;
items within the scope of application module Layered interconnect module 3d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1697;
items within the scope of application module Text representation, ISO/CD-TS 10303-xxxx.

sc.description: All members of this constraint maps to entity with additional constraints in the mapping, except and . All of them require UNIQUE string for ., so ONEOF subtype constraint from ARM is guaranteed as not violated, except . Latter case is covered by pte_part_template_definition_subtypes constraint.
